channel.title: iOS on K.Q. Dreger
channel.description: Recent content in iOS on K.Q. Dreger

item.title: Edit
item.description: Just over a year ago, I started working on a small iOS app for writers. I was tired of not having a focused, single-purpose place for drafting and editing important messages, emails, and text. I hated doing those things in Messages or Mail, and I avoided Notes because what I was writing didn’t need to be stored anywhere. All I wanted was a tasteful place to write. Well, I’ve finished, and next week I’m excited to ship Edit for iOS.
